short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for selected text with any engine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can achieve the following:
  - Add new custom search engines.
  - Search for selected text, known as Selection Search.
  - Search from the address bar, known as the Omnibox.
  - Search InPrivate/Incognito mode.
  - Change the order in which they appear in the browser menu.

To add a new search engine you need two things, a name and URL:
  1. Click the extension icon.
  2. Type the name that will appear in the Right-click menu.
  3. In the URL, put %s where the search term should go.

To search for selected text:
   1. Select the text you want to search for.
   2. Right-click > Lett Search With > Choose from your custom list.

To search from the address bar:
    1. Type the special keyword "lett"
    2. The name of the engine.
    3. Your query.

For example:
	lett youtube etc..

For Incognito search from the address bar, add x to the search engine name:
	lett youtubex etc..

If you need assistance please refer to the Support Hub below.
